model

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Card
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlayingCard

    public abstract class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    DarkWingedDaemon

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int face_value
      The value used to represent this Card's face.
      protected boolean faceUp
      The value used to represent whether or not this Card is face up.
      protected int suit
      The value used to represent this Card's suit.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Card()
      Constructs a default card object.
      Card(int newFace)
      Constructs a Card object with the specified face_value value.
      Card(int newFace, int newSuit)
      Constructs a Card object with the specified face_value, and suit values.
      Card(int newFace, int newSuit, boolean newUp)
      Constructs a Card object with the specified face_value, suit, and faceUp values.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(Card c)
        Compares the specified object with this Card for equality. Returns true if both face_value, and suit values are the same on both objects.
        Parameters:
        c - The object to be compared for equality with this Card.
        Returns:
        True if the specified object is equal to this card.

      • save

        Saves card object as a string.

      • load

        public void load(java.lang.String save)
        Loads a card object from a string.
        Parameters:
        save - The string to be processed into a Card object.

      • load

        protected void load(int newFace,
        int newSuit,
        boolean newUp)
        Reconstructs this Card with data extracted by the previous load method.
        Parameters:
        newFace - The face_value extracted from a string.
        newSuit - The suit extracted from a string.
        newUp - The faceUp extracted from a string.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Formats this Card into a string. If the field faceUp is true the formatted string is returned, otherwise a default string is returned.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A string representation of this Card.
